group_1.textRight: What kind of video are you filming today?

group_1.textLeft: Today's project is...@Perfect for a suuuper hot summer day:
[chara:305251:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]The Japanese Horror Project: part 5!

group_1.textRight: ...Haven't we done enough of that yet?

group_1.textLeft: That includes all the rejected takes@we couldn't release!

group_1.textRight: It's not that we can't get caught up@in strange incidents,
but that we keep missing them on video, huh...

group_1.textLeft: Sou desu yo!! That's why I'm fired up today!

group_1.textRight: ...Huh?
By the way, is Kumanosuke not with you today?

group_1.textLeft: Look at this!
I transplanted him onto a swimsuit,@so now he is a flat bear!

group_1.textRight: [chara:303551:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah, that's a joke...right?@Has the horror already started...?

group_1.textLeft: Gomen ne!! Of course it is a joke!
Kumanosuke is staying home in his locker@at the beach house!

group_1.textRight: You scared me for a second...
So today Mister Bear here on your swimsuit@will be substituting for Kumanosuke.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305251:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hai!! And now...we're off!

group_1.textCenter: Doumo!! Ashley Taylor here!
Using the hottest new tips from our viewership,
we're going to go investigate strange phenomena!
First up, we have something that was spotted@in this very area just last evening:
A poltergeist phenomenon!
Though no one was around, a rustling was heard,
and a flower by the road appeared@to have been plucked!

group_1.textRight: I-is that really true...?

group_1.textLeft: Un! Right where we're standing!
I figured you wouldn't be scared if it's at noon,@so we're doing it now!

group_1.textCenter: ...Oh? Ashley and Riko?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...Ui and her big sisters!

group_1.textRight: Are you in the middle of filming@a video with Ashley?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305251:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hai!!
A poltergeist...@We're tracking down a disturbing phantom.

group_1.textRight: ...Did something happen here?
Um, the phantom that picked the flower,@that may have been me...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305251:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hontou desuka!? How could that be!?

group_1.textRight: Right now...we're staying overnight nearby...
And, around this time yesterday,@I was collecting flowers.
We picked lots of flowers to press, you see!

group_1.textLeft: It's just that Sana,@she can't be seen by normal people...

group_1.textRight: Then the person who gave the info@to Ashley saw that...

group_1.textLeft: And assumed it was a poltergeist!?

group_1.textRight: ...It seems so.

group_1.textLeft: ...The true identity of the disturbing phantom@was a KAWAII magical girl.

group_1.textRight: The mystery was solved,@but we can't reveal that, can we...

group_1.textLeft: But we must never give up!
There are still more reports from our viewers!

group_1.textCenter: Up next,@a word from a student at Mizuna Girl's Academy
[chara:305251:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]about the truth behind a ghost by the seashore!

group_1.textRight: That is unnecessary.

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Miss Ria and Miss Mayu, why are you here?

group_1.textRight: We have seaside school.@And the ghost was revealed as of yesterday.

group_1.textLeft: Uwa!! I must know!

group_1.textRight: Umm... well...

group_1.textCenter: ...I think they mistook me for something else.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305251:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Subarashii!!! What an omega KAWAII ghost!

group_1.textRight: So...then...@The identity of the ghost...
Yep, it's me.

group_1.textLeft: ...If you're aware of it, then why would you even@think of putting that swimsuit back on?
The truth ended up KAWAII,@but it looks like this is out too.

group_1.textRight: I don't know...if this would work as an apology,
but I can offer you one piece of information.
Yesterday, some middle school children@saw a strange floaty on the beach.

group_1.textLeft: What kind of floaty?

group_1.textRight: Well...the floaty looked like a doggie,
but it moved along the beach by itself...@Seemingly making a barking sound...

group_1.textLeft: Ah...that,
Isn't that this?

group_1.textRight: [chara:303250:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!?
It does look just like the floaty in question,@doesn't it...

group_1.textLeft: Yesterday, I came to the beach with my family,
and Mameji started crawling around@with this floaty on his head...
Iiya...@More KAWAII truth.

group_1.textRight: It isn't easy coming across Japanese horror,@is it...

group_1.textLeft: I hate to say it, but let's call it quits today!
I'm sure Kumanosuke is tired@of waiting in the coin locker!

group_1.textCenter: Haha!
... A message? From my friends in class?
Ah, the latest scary story they've heard...?

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Did you hear about the "][textRed:curse of@the gurokawa teddy bear][textBlack:"!?@It's always with you, even if you leave@it somewhere and go away...]
[textBlack:They say the bear gets jealous,@and then a curse befalls you!]

[textBlack:And then this curse, right? They say@it does the opposite of what its owner@wants... Like if you want something@][textRed:KAWAII][textBlack:, something ][textRed:terrible][textBlack: happens@to you, but if you want something@][textRed:terrible][textBlack: to happen, something ][textRed:KAWAII@][textBlack:happens instead!]
[textBlack:But it seems if you go see the bear@and give it a big hug, the curse will@disappear.@...You think it's real?]

group_1.textCenter: [chara:303501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!?
W-w-w-what do I do!?
Should I tell Ash...?
Ah...b-but...@If I tell her about this,
she might start thinking differently,
and then Ash herself might start getting scared...
But then again...there might not be a curse@and it could just be some coincidence...
[chara:303501:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Ahhhh, what do I dooo...!!
